name: Delay The Asteroid
description:
An asteroid is inevitably going to collide with earth! Delay the collision for as long as possible. My submission to Ludum Dare 50, with the theme: Delay the Inevitable.

[ Controls ]

Press Spacebar to launch a bullet from the canon. This bullet will push the asteroid upwards. Keep it upwards to gain a score. 

Press the Tab Key to Restart the game.

[ Credits ] 

Art by Greerenz: https://greerenzart.wixsite.com/greerenz

Music by Dennis Sousa
